casebody.data:
BRAY et al. v. UNITED STATES FIDELITY & GUARANTY CO. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Fourth Circuit. January 9, 1915.) No. 1260. Appeal-from the District Court of the United States for the District of West Virginia, at Parkersburg. H. P. Camden, of Parkersburg, W. Va., for appellants. B. M. Ambler, of Parkersburg, W. Va., for appellee.

Before KNAPP and WOODS, Circuit Judges, and MeDOWELL, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Decree of District Court affirmed. 218 Fed. 987, 133 C. C. A. 669. Appeal to the Supreme Court allowed.
